name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In order to meet the assessment and avoid falling back into poverty, Guang'an City, Sichuan Province, has adopted the measure of apportionment. All department staff are forced to purchase high-priced agricultural and sideline products from poor households every month according to their level, under the euphemism of consumer assistance.
However, poor households do not have many agricultural and sideline products at home, so they can only go to the market to purchase them and then resell them to civil servants.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Harbin, a man posted a video saying that he had just deposited 6,000 yuan in China Everbright Bank and wanted to transfer it to his elderly for medical treatment, but the bank told him that there was a problem with the system and the money would not be credited to his card until three days later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content: The Shanghai Stock Exchange and the Shenzhen Stock Exchange issued an announcement stating that starting from August 19, the data on "northbound funds" will no longer be disclosed in real time on a daily basis, but will be published quarterly. Some people believe that northbound funds have a huge impact on A-shares, and no longer disclosing them in real time will help stabilize investor confidence.
